answers.answer: Diabetes makes no difference in regards to the window period.Diabetics are "normal" people, BTW.  They are normal people who happen to have diabetes.
Window period for HIV is 3 months.

Teak,It seems from this from your more active and experienced. I agree that 3 months conclusive. My question is a diabetic person getting tested negative at 6weeks can he trusted and relax or the diabetic aversely affect the window period or seroconversation. I had a exposure and I am diabetic and my 6 weeks come by next week.

question: I am going through this forum to get an answer for window period if a person is diabetic. Many and Drs say in this forum that 6 weeks in definitive for a normal person. I am really confused if the test was negative for a diabetic peron at six weeks can be same as normal person and can he relax.Thx.Kum
title: Diabetics and window period
